title: Software Engineer
requirements: 3+ years experience in software development, knowledge of Python and JavaScript.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data and build predictive models to support business decisions.
requirements: 2+ years experience in machine learning, proficiency in Python, SQL, and TensorFlow.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create and maintain responsive user interfaces.
requirements: Experience with React, HTML, CSS, and responsive design.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build scalable APIs and manage cloud infrastructure.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js, databases, and cloud services (AWS/Azure).

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user-friendly and visually appealing web and mobile interfaces.
requirements: Experience in Figma, Adobe XD, and a strong portfolio of design projects.
